name: LD49: Shields Down
description:
The station shield has become unstable due to a system virus. Gather resources from nearby asteriods to try and keep the station intact.

W, A, S, D to move the spaceship

Space to attach / detach containers

Fly near asteroids with attached containers to mine automatically.

Detach containers near the station to unload the resources. The resources are automatically coverted to credits.

Spend credits to purchase upgrades or repairs.

You cannot win... Only survive.

Sounds from kenney.nl
